questions.question: What is the dominant color of the packaging's main area?
What is the primary material of the product's packaging?
What is the approximate weight of the product indicated on the packaging?
What shape is the overall packaging of the product?
What kind of nuts are depicted on the packaging?
What is the texture of the packaging's surface appear to be?
What language(s) are used on the nutrition information panel?
What is the style of the text on the packaging?
What design element is prominently placed on one side of the bag?
Are there any images of the product besides the logo present?
Is the overall packaging design simplistic or complex?
Does the packaging have any clear seals or tampering evidence?
What is the general tone or style of the branding?
Are there any nutritional facts visible on the bag?
What is depicted in the small images on the packaging besides the logo?
